Maria is always ready to learn more about her position and Spreetail. Even if she's worried it's a silly question or she might waste someone's time, she asks it anyway. These same questions are why she has learned so much in her first 3 months!

This is what it means to PRACTICE HUMILITY, and that's one of our mantra's core values. We share stories like Maria's in each week's company meeting to keep our mantra at the forefront of all we do at Spreetail. After all, we live it each and every day!

My focus is to drive operational excellence for all departments within Customer Success. From customer on-boarding, support, training, to customer retention and additional up-sell services. I partner closely with Sales, Engineering, and Partner departments to drive Customer Success towards annual strategies and goals. I also work to drive data needs, budget accountability, and operating mechanisms across my department to aid in organizational growth.

I provided strategic and operational oversight intended to improve the customer experience of Bolste's SMB customers as well as evolving needs for the organization by analyzing customer feedback. A main focus of my role was implementing processes and procedures for all of my teams to ensure that customers were informed, educated, and trained as to the scope of services provided.I also assisted in new product and process launches, forecasting opportunities and recommending customer facing program processes while analyzing source performance through conversion metrics. My goal was to maximize Bolste's efficiency for my customers as well as brand awareness to effectively align with organizational goals.

I was responsible for establishing and overseeing the customer success teams as well as structuring objectives and initiatives at Bolste in relation to the customer life-cycle and retention based services. As the primary advocate of a customer base that exceeded 18,000 paid and beta customers, a main focus of my role was implementing processes and procedures for my teams.By working closely with Executive Leadership, Development and Sales we were able to gather and synthesize data to suggest optimal usage and improvements in products to increase renewals. Using business analytics and intelligence provided the team insight on ways to create and drive change to improve the customer experience and build customer loyalty.

I was responsible for the management of client success by recommending tactical and strategic marketing strategies and executing them. I collaborated with an exceptional group of project managers and my team of fulfillment members to oversee campaigns throughout every developmental phase. As the primary point of contact for key accounts, my responsibility was to ensure projects were completed on time and on budget, all while managing client expectations for quality and effectiveness within our product set.I worked closely with V Digital Leadership and the Local SEO team on building a customer experience and retention process to benefit users, as well as revenue for the department. * V Digital Services is a part of Voice Media Group (VMG). *VMG owns the rights to the Dallas Observer, Houston Press, LA Weekly, Phoenix New Times, Miami New Times, Denver Westword, and Broward - Palm Beach New Times. VMG sold the rights to Village Voice, City Pages and Riverfront Times for an undisclosed amount.

I was promoted in September 2013 to Senior Marketing Consultant within the Local Department where I managed over $2.6M in client contracts. While in this role, I managed a size-able book of business in a wide variety of segments and had an average churn rate of only 7% per month during my time in role. My main focus was to identify issues while forming hypotheses and solutions, and thus presenting those findings and recommendations to my clients within their contracts. I also provided consultation on the development and improvement of clients’ marketing strategies. I lead and assisted those within the team, while implementing recommendations or solutions and ensuring that all clients received the necessary assistance needed for a positive experience.* Web.com Group Inc. (Nasdaq:WEB) acquired Yodle in a transaction valued at approximately  $342M.

It’s rare that you come across standout talent like Josh.  I had the pleasure of working with him during his tenure at V Digital Services (A Voice Media Group Company).  We collaborated project items including a product retention strategy.  I was particularly impressed by his ability to handle even the toughest clients and come up with solutions that worked.  People skills often take years to develop among professionals, but it seemed to come perfectly naturally to him.  His knowledge of digital marketing combined with these skills attributed to the value he provided the agency.  I would recommend Josh for any leadership/management and or otherwise strategic retention role and any company would be lucky to have him!
